Package project_package

Class ProjectView

java.lang.Object
project_package.ProjectView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ProjectView extends Object implements Serializable
The ProjectView class is responsible for managing projects, including their creation, modification, and archiving. It interacts with the database to retrieve, add, update, and archive project information. This class uses JavaServer Faces (JSF) annotations and PrimeFaces for the user interface. It includes methods to initialize the database tables, retrieve projects, add, update, and archive projects, and manage project teams.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Robin Deplanques
See Also:

      Saves the selected teams for a project.

      public String getDeleteButtonMessage()
      Gets the button message for deleting projects based on the number of selected projects.
      Returns:
      The button message indicating the number of selected projects.

    • hasSelectedProjects

      public boolean hasSelectedProjects()
      Checks if there are any selected projects.
      Returns:
      True if there are selected projects, otherwise false.

      Checks if there is only one selected project.
      Returns:
      True if there is only one selected project, otherwise false.

      public void archiveSelectedProjects()
      Archives the selected projects by moving them to the Archive table in the database.

      The DualListModel containing source and target project teams.

    • setProjectTeams

      Sets the dual list model for managing project teams.
      Parameters:
      projectTeams - The DualListModel to set.

    • editTeams

      public void editTeams()
      Edits the teams for the selected project. It populates the source and target lists based on the project type (Individual or Group).

    • getStudents

      Retrieves the list of students from the database.

      A list of Student objects representing students.

      Returns:
      A list of Team objects representing teams.

    • availableStudents

      Returns:
      A list of ProjectTeam objects representing available students.

    • addRemoveTeammates

      Adds or removes teammates from the Team table based on the provided list.
      Parameters:

      selectedProject - Project for which teammates are added or removed.
